Class TCPConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,TCPConnection>
      • com.example.ontruckconnector.TCPConnection

  • public class TCPConnection
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,TCPConnection>
    Handles the TCP connection.

      • run

        public void run()
        The run method runs infinitely as long as the this task hasn't been canceled. The run method is suppose to attempt a TCP connection to the given IP-address.
